As a part of the larger research and development program being
planned by the agency* ICA will endeavor to undertake a development program
in the field of communications mediae Included in such a project will be
the means for the acquisition and production of prototype educational
materials suitable for distribution by television,. Such a project would
also permit the experimentation in and development of techniques and methods
for planning and producing such materials* their adaptation for use in
different cultures* and the utilization of these materials in the learning
situationo Information developed through this program* as well as that
collected from other sources, would be processed and distributed to all

The following are the specific policy guidelines which are to be
used in considering assistance for the development of educational television
resources s
lo When circumstances warrant* ICA will favorably consider requests
